channel.title: sci on Chang's blog
channel.description: Recent content in sci on Chang's blog

item.title: Make Your Own Feeds for Science
item.description: The Internet is becoming more and more isolated and fragmented, but this has never been caused by technical issues. Ironically, this phenomenon is particularly prominent in scientific journals, which is the exact opposite of the concept of openness and cooperation that science claims. A scientist usually spend lots of time in visiting multiple websites for different scientific journals to follow the latest articles in a specific field. An experienced scientist is often familiar with the layout of journal websites and keeps in mind the content style of different articles.
